objects.text:
• FULL HD 1920x1080
• 1MS VRB RESPONSE TIME
• 100Hz REFRESH RATE
• EYE CARE TECHNOLOGY

product_details.name: Acer EK220Q Ebi 21.5 Inch IPS Full HD (1920x1080) Backlit LED LCD Monitor I 1 MS VRB, 100Hz Refresh I 250 Nits I 99% SRGB I HDMI & VGA Ports with HDMI Cable I AMD Free Sync I Eye Care Features (Black)
product_details.description: Brand: acer. Series: EK220Q E3. Colour: Black. Item Height: 18.11 Centimeters. Item Width: 50.29 Centimeters. Standing screen display size: 21.5 Inches. Screen Resolution: 1920 x 1080. Resolution: 1920 x 1080 Pixels. Product Dimensions: 37.9 x 50.29 x 18.11 cm; 2.8 kg. Number of HDMI Ports: 1. Voltage: 240 Volts. Country of Origin: China. Item Weight: 2 kg 800 g. Importer: ACER INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED Embassy Heights, 6th Floor, No. 13 Magrath Road, Next to HOSMAT Hospital, Bangalore, INDIA – 560025. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 37.9 x 50.3 x 18.1 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Piece. Generic Name: Monitor.

banner_details:
The banner is visually divided into four quadrants, each delivering key product details with high contrast and futuristic design. The top-left quadrant contains three text layers: a bold **brand name ("brand")**, a futuristic **product type ("heading")**, and a sleek **tagline ("tagline")**, all aligned to the left. The top-right quadrant centers on the **product image ("product_image")**, showcasing the monitor's design. The bottom-left section highlights a bullet-point **feature list ("description")**, the **price ("price")**, and a pink **call-to-action button ("cta_background" & "cta")**. The bottom-right quadrant emphasizes two **product specs ("specification_2" and "specification_3")** alongside the **screen size ("specification_1")**. 

**Color Palette**:
- Midnight Navy: `#000C24`
- Electric Blue: `#00C2FF`
- Neon Magenta: `#FF00B8`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Indigo Blue: `#1B2F6D`
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant neon cityscape on a monitor display, with colors smoothly transitioning from deep purples to pinks, blues, and bright cyan highlights. The background sky is a starry gradient (#0D003D to #190042), blending into a neon sunrise/sunset glow at the horizon (#FF2D95 and #FFC300). Skyscrapers are detailed in hues of cyan (#00E5FF), magenta (#FF00FF), and electric blue (#377DFF), providing dramatic contrast and depth. The monitor’s bold display emphasizes high-definition visuals with bright highlights such as white (#FFFFFF) for text and vivid accents like green (#00FF85) and red (#FF0033) in the IPS icon. This energetic palette provides a futuristic and dynamic theme perfect for an advertisement banner.
